channel.title: Recording Axoloti Without SD Card
channel.description:
Hi!
Is there a way to record the axoloti live patch without an SD card? I want to take what i made in the patch and have what is played put it into a track in a DAW (logic/ableton/etc) but I'm working without an SD card...

item.title: Recording Axoloti Without SD Card
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

bit confused... do it as you would any synth,
take your audio output (jack) from axoloti and plug into your computer via an audio interface, then record in the daw.

its that of use some kind of digital recorder, I recently got a zoom at that's great, not only can record to sdcard but also can act as an audio interface as well... perfect for a portable setup.

Read full topic
